definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: It has dignity and self-love stronger than mine.
sentences.chinese: 它的尊嚴與自愛比我的更強烈。

sentences.english: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.chinese: 我們這樣做是因爲我們相信每個人的尊嚴和價值。

sentences.english: Boxing is about respect - getting it for yourself and taking it away from the other guy.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊是關於尊嚴，贏得你自己的，同時也剝奪別人的。

sentences.english: The Palestinian cause is the cause of human dignity.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦的問題是人類尊嚴的問題。

sentences.english: Nobility and dignity of people is the core values of humanitarian.
sentences.chinese: 人的高貴和尊嚴是人道主義的核心價值。

sentences.english: Those behave fawningly to rich one have no money received and that means they offer their soul, their dignity for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 奉承的人沒有錢收而獻出他們的靈魂他們的尊嚴。

sentences.english: He may retain his human dignity even in a concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 即使是置身於集中營，他仍可以保有他的人性尊嚴。

sentences.english: The most lowly people of society became dignified beings in Millet's paintings.
sentences.chinese: 社會中最卑微的人，卻成爲米勒畫中有尊嚴的生命。

sentences.english: The right of privacy embodies the dignity and the value of human being.
sentences.chinese: 隱私權作爲人格權的一種，體現了人的尊嚴和價值。

sentences.english: The Squire presided, dignified and tall.
sentences.chinese: 尊嚴的治安官當主席，身材筆挺。

sentences.english: It is against the perfect humanness of Jesus that the dignity of every man is to be measured.
sentences.chinese: 這是對完美人性的耶穌的尊嚴，每個人都是來衡量。

sentences.english: No freedom without sacrifice, endless blood perpetuated convictions of our national dignity. (UTOYXC)
sentences.chinese: 爲自由而流的血，鑄成永垂不朽的民族尊嚴。

sentences.english: Marlowe struggled with a niggling respect for the man, despite his sore jaw.
sentences.chinese: 瑪露力爭維護那男人的尊嚴，不管她父親的那種教訓。

sentences.english: Peridot is given as a symbol of fame, dignity, and protection.
sentences.chinese: 橄欖石是給出一個聲譽，尊嚴的象徵，和保護。

sentences.english: In the past, Drug testing and ego issues have gotten in the way of making the fight.
sentences.chinese: 過去，藥檢和尊嚴的爭論阻礙了拳賽的進行。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
to deprive/to expropriate/to strip (sb of his property)
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
